data.name: Mother Ghoul
data.description:
If you’re reading this, then I am already dead. And you are her next victim. 

I awoke in a fresh grave, soaked to my skin. My head… Everything is a blur. Had someone knocked me out? I don’t know where I am or what this place is. But she wants revenge. Revenge for her stillborn children. 

I’ve been running for hours now. So tired. I have searched through manuscripts and clues left by her previous victims, but I cannot get out. 

She wants blood—my blood. And if she has found me, she will be coming for you next. 

Please, do as I say and you might escape with your life:

- Search for Mother Ghoul’s 6 stillborn children and destroy them using a sacred ritual
- Avoid the demon servants hunting you on her behalf—DON’T let them catch you
- Use the blue light of your UV flashlight to buy yourself time
- The battery will recharge—but use it wisely
- Find the clues and solve the mystery
- DON’T LET HER CATCH YOU

Do what I could not. Escape the Mother Ghoul. Complete the ritual.
Break the Curse of the Unborn…
